meanings.definition: A flat piece of metal, typically round, bearing an inscription or design, made to commemorate an event or awarded as a distinction to someone such as a soldier, athlete, or scholar.
meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed her collection of medals on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The soldier received a medal for his bravery in battle.
meanings.sent3: The athlete joked that he needed more medals to weigh him down during the race.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a shining medal in the sea of selfishness.
meanings.sent5: The medals gleamed under the bright lights of the ceremony.

meanings.definition: To award a medal to someone.
meanings.sent1: The general medals the soldiers for their exceptional service.
meanings.sent2: The committee decided to medal the top three students in the competition.
meanings.sent3: She playfully threatened to medal her friend for being the best baker in town.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to the cause medaled him as a true hero in the eyes of the public.
meanings.sent5: The teacher will medal the students who show outstanding improvement in their grades.
